price: 这是已遭毁灭的那些市镇的消息，我把它告诉你。那些市镇有废墟犹在的，有荡然无存的。
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ مِنۡ أَنۢبَآءِ ٱلۡقُرَىٰ نَقُصُّهُۥ عَلَيۡكَۖ مِنۡهَا قَآئِمٞ وَحَصِيدٞ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: dhālika min anbāi al-qurā naquṣṣuhu ʿalayka min'hā qāimun waḥaṣīdun
